about.title: about
about.text: As a highly motivated Frontend developer, my experience covers Israel, Russia and United States. I have extensive experience building single page applications and mobile applications. I constantly seek to improve my developer skill set by completing additional courses and staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies.

item1.text: Leveraged Next.js for server-side rendering and efficient client-side routing, providing a performant and SEO-friendly web application. Implemented Redux Thunk to manage asynchronous actions, state management, and data flow, enabling smooth user interactions and data handling.

item2.company: Front-end Web Developer at Edeal Inc
item2.text: Conceptualized and developed a comprehensive, reusable component library, streamlining the development process and promoting consistent design across projects.

item3.company: Front-end Web Developer at Get Robo VPN
item3.text: Developed a responsive and user-friendly Single Page Application (SPA) for seamless integration into the Telegram Web App Bot.

item4.company: Front-end Web Developer at Ava Mind
item4.text: Developed a responsive and user-friendly Single Page Application (SPA). Assumed a leadership role in strategizing project roadmap, effectively coordinating with key stakeholders to maintain alignment throughout the development process.

projects.item1: The Social Network Icons component is a versatile and customizable React component that allows you to easily display social network icons in your application.
projects.item2: React-Codebook is an npm package that provides a versatile environment for writing and executing React.js code snippets.
projects.item3: This project is my pet project used only for practice and fun. I discovered before, that Riot Games have an awesome API and this is a core of this project.
projects.item4: The Number Guessing Game App is an interactive mobile application developed using React Native, designed to engage users in a fun and challenging guessing game.
projects.item5: Responsive and user-friendly Single Page Application (SPA) for seamless integration into the Telegram Web App Bot.
projects.item6: Favorite Places, your go-to app for discovering new places, capturing vivid memories, and effortlessly managing your favorite locations.
projects.item7: NextJS Blog is a simple blog application built with Next.js and TypeScript.
